Address.label: Address
Address.value: 4600 SILICON DRIVE, DURHAM, North Carolina, 27703, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Wolfspeed Inc is involved in the manufacturing of wide bandgap semiconductors. It is focused on silicon carbide and gallium nitride (GaN) materials and devices for power and radio-frequency (RF) applications. The company serves applications such as transportation, power supplies, inverters, and wireless systems. Geographically, it derives a majority of revenue from Europe and also has a presence in the United States; China; Japan; South Korea, and other countries.

value.name: Priya Almelkar
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
